name: Christian J. Lagares Nieves
body:
### Welcome to my home page.
I am **Christian Lagares**, a Mechanical Engineering Student at the University of Puerto Rico at Mayaguez. I am a firm believer that Computer Programming and Computer Aided Design have the capability of transforming the world into a better place. I look forward to a graduate education to combine my passion for Design and Programming into tools that can help thrust research in areas that would benefit the world.   

**My vision**: Leave this world with a consciousness that I used my abilities and my knowledge to make it a better place.   

**My motto**: If you are going to do something, do the best you can, if you are not giving your 100% then don't do it.   

### Education
2013 - present          **University of Puerto Rico, Mayagüez Campus**   
                        Faculty of Engineering, Department of Mechanical Engineering   
                        Expected Graduation Date: May 2018   

2010 - 2013             **Academia Cristiana Catacumba, Mayaguez, P.R.**   
                        High School Diploma   

### Experience
2014 - 2015             **University of Puerto Rico, Mayagüez Campus**   
> Developing solutions and functional mechanical prototypes through Computer- Aided Design for Research Purposes. During this time, I have developed parallel computing capabilities on the MatLab Programming Environment and have enhanced my computer aided design capabilities.   

2013 - 2014             **University of Puerto Rico, Mayagüez Campus**   
> Working on several Research activities including Non-Destructive Evaluation utilizing 3D Printing, 3D Scanning and Computer-Aided Design, and the translation of existing problems into CAD models for further study and testing   

2009 - 2013             **Academia Cristiana Catacumba, Mayaguez, P.R.**   
> Offered tutoring on all mayor school subjects from 7th to 12th grade
